name: Export Invoice Ninja invoices to Microsoft Excel 365 as new rows
description: Every time a new invoice is created on Invoice Ninja, Make will add it to your Excel 365 spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses a table created according to [this example](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AikeC5lv6MsOnPAST82n3_3g30RBeg?e=frviVh).
